name: Chicken Clone
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

Gameplay:
Each time you die a copy will take your place and you will start from the last checkpoint to retry the platforming.

Controls:

A/DMoveSpace barJump
Double Jump (press twice)Left ShiftRun
Left ClickRemove CloneEscape/PPause


Credits:
Programming by V4lle95
Sounds by freesound.org
Pixellari font by Zacchary Dempsey-Plante
Rocky Roads Asset Pack by Essssam
